key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to stringent industry standards and ongoing litigation
Supply chain vulnerabilities exacerbated by global disruptions
Intense competitive pressures from major industry players
Scrutiny over human rights and labor practices
controversies: Ongoing litigation in the U.S. initiated in May 2020 against Sysmex Corporation and its subsidiary, Sysmex America, Inc.
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental impact through eco-friendly manufacturing and waste reduction programs
social_issues: 63% of employees are union members, indicating potential labor relations challenges
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks and potential reputational damage from unresolved litigation
